translations: n．激动，兴奋：一种强烈的愉悦感，通常由于某种刺激或令人兴奋的事件引起。
· The roller coaster ride gave me a lot of thrills.
过山车之旅给了我很多激动。
v．使激动，使兴奋：给予某人强烈的愉悦感或兴奋。

sentences.sentence: My boys beat the best team in Georgia, giving me one of the greatest thrills of my life!
sentences.translation: 我的小伙子们打败了乔治亚州最好的球队，这是我一生中最激动人心的时刻！

sentences.sentence: They read the book and that thrills me today.
sentences.translation: 他们读了这本书，让我今天兴奋不已。

sentences.sentence: The uncertainty of winning provides added attraction and desirability through emotional thrills.
sentences.translation: 因为情感上的刺激性，胜利的不确定性增加了其吸引力和别人得到它的欲望。
